dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, have you seen the news about Putin's recent meeting?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, have you seen the news about Putin's recent meeting?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, the one in St. Petersburg with all those international news agencies?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, the one in St. Petersburg with all those international news agencies?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Russian President Vladimir Putin during a meeting with heads of international news agencies in St. Petersburg, according to RIA Novosti.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! He, um, met with reps from the US, UK, Germany, France, China, even Turkey.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! He, um, met with reps from the U S, U K, Germany, France, China, even Turkey.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Russian president held a meeting with representatives from news agencies of the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France, China, and Turkey.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And the big takeaway, like, for me, was his comments on Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And the big takeaway, like, for me, was his comments on Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he really emphasized that. He said they have a "special allied relationship."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he really emphasized that. He said they have a special allied relationship.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Russia and Kazakhstan have a special allied relationship, stated Russian President Vladimir Putin during a meeting with heads of international news agencies in St. Petersburg, according to RIA Novosti.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Special? He went further than that, didn't he? [overlaps] Like, "in the truest sense of the word."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Special? He went further than that, didn't he? Like, in the truest sense of the word.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These are allied relations in the truest sense of the word, Putin said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] He did, yeah! "Allied relations in the truest sense of the word," he, uh, specifically stated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did, yeah! Allied relations in the truest sense of the word, he, uh, specifically stated.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These are allied relations in the truest sense of the word, Putin said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's quite a strong statement to make, um, publicly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's quite a strong statement to make, um, publicly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And it came out of this meeting where he also apparently touched on a potential meeting with Zelensky...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And it came out of this meeting where he also apparently touched on a potential meeting with Zelensky...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the same meeting, the Russian leader also commented on a possible meeting with European leaders and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the same meeting, the Russian leader also commented on a possible meeting with European leaders and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. And even the Iran-Israel conflict, though we didn't get details on those specific comments.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. And even the Iran-Israel conflict, though we didn't get details on those specific comments.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the same meeting, the Russian leader also commented on a possible meeting with European leaders and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, as well as on the conflict between Iran and Israel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a pretty wide-ranging discussion, but Kazakhstan seemed to be, like, the highlight for him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a pretty wide-ranging discussion, but Kazakhstan seemed to be, like, the highlight for him.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. A very deliberate message there, I think.
